espnscrapeR 0.4.0

Get NFL schedule for a specific year from ESPN's API

Source: R/get_nfl_schedule.R
get_nfl_schedule.Rd

Get NFL schedule for a specific year from ESPN's API

get_nfl_schedule(season)

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get standings from 2018 season
get_nfl_schedule(season = "2018")
#> Returning data for 2018!
#> # A tibble: 333 x 54
#>    matchup matchup_short season  type slug  game_id game_uid game_date

#>  3 Buffal… BUF @ JAX       2017     3 post… 400999… s:20~l:… 2018-01-…
#>  4 Caroli… CAR @ NO        2017     3 post… 400999… s:20~l:… 2018-01-…

#>  8 New Or… NO @ MIN        2017     3 post… 400999… s:20~l:… 2018-01-…
#>  9 Jackso… JAX @ NE        2017     3 post… 400999… s:20~l:… 2018-01-…
#> 10 Minnes… MIN @ PHI       2017     3 post… 400999… s:20~l:… 2018-01-…
